Literature.Title: De-novo design of antimicrobial peptides for plant protection.
Literature.Author: Zeitler B, Herrera Diaz A, Dangel A, Thellmann M, Meyer H, Sattler M, Lindermayr C

Literature.Title: A de novo-designed antimicrobial peptide with activity against multiresistant Staphylococcus aureus acting on RsbW kinase.
Literature.Author: Dangel A, Ackermann N, Abdel-Hadi O, Maier R, Önder K, Francois P, Müller CW, Pané-Farré J, Engelmann S, Schrenzel J, Heesemann J, Lindermayr C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Botrytis cinerea(MIC=>100µg/ml),Alternaria alternata(MIC=>100µg/ml),Cladosporium herbarum(MIC=40µg/ml),Clavibacter michiganensis subsp. michiganensis DSM 46294(MIC=>40µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum DSM 30168(MIC=>40µg/ml),Xanthomonas vesicatoria DSM 50861(MIC=>40µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato DC3000(MIC=>40µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae DSM 10604(MIC=>40µg/ml),Pseudomonas corrugata DSM 7228(MIC=>40µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 90857(MIC=>62.5µM)
